mapper.select: select l.pname as pcode, b.bdate, b.bname, b.bcont from boarddb b left outer join listdb l on (b.pcode = l.pcode) where b.bnum = #{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into boarddb select SEQ_boardDB.NEXTVAL, ucode, #{param2}, #{param3}, pcode, sysdate, 2, 2, 0, 0 from orderdb where ocode = #{param1}
mapper.select: select b.bname, l.pname as pcode, b.bdate from boarddb b left outer join listdb l on (b.pcode = l.pcode) where b.bcode = (select ucode from userdb where userid = #{param1}) and b.btype = #{param2}
